snippet.title: Arma 3 (Arma Karts DLC Teaser)
snippet.description:
Originally teased as an April Fool's joke, Arma Karts is now all too real, offering a number of track objectives and checkpoint races.
» Subscribe To Joystiq: http://bit.ly/1g2pjrx
» Watch more Joystiq video here: http://goo.gl/KdZUci

About: Joystiq.com is your definitive source for video game news and commentary, the latest game videos and screenshots, reviews and previews, all presented with as much excitement, enthusiasm, insight and fun as the laws of physics allow.
